# 247Electrician

> 24/7 emergency electrician service covering the Black Country, Birmingham, Walsall, Dudley, Wolverhampton and West Midlands, UK. NAPIT approved, fully insured, BS 7671 compliant. Operated by ANP Electrical Ltd.

247Electrician provides residential and commercial electrical services including emergency callouts, rewiring, fuse board upgrades, EICR certificates, EV charger installation, solar installation, and specialist landlord compliance services. We offer volume discounts for property managers (up to 25% off for 20+ properties).

**Phone:** 01902 943 929 (24/7)
**WhatsApp:** +44 1902 943 929
**Email:** info@247electrician.uk
**Website:** https://247electrician.uk
**Location:** Bilston, West Midlands, UK

## Services

- [Emergency Callouts](https://247electrician.uk/services/emergency-callouts): 24/7 rapid response for electrical emergencies, 30-90 minute response time
- [Fault Finding & Repairs](https://247electrician.uk/services/fault-finding-and-repairs): Professional diagnosis and repair of electrical faults
- [Fuse Board Upgrades](https://247electrician.uk/services/fuse-board-upgrades): Modern consumer unit installations with RCD/RCBO protection
- [Full & Partial Rewiring](https://247electrician.uk/services/rewiring): Complete rewiring solutions for older properties
- [EICR Certificates](https://247electrician.uk/services/eicr-certificates): Electrical Installation Condition Reports for homeowners and landlords
- [EV Charger Installation](https://247electrician.uk/services/ev-charger-installation): Home and commercial EV charging point installation
- [Solar Installation](https://247electrician.uk/services/solar-installation): Solar panel systems and battery storage
- [Lighting Installation](https://247electrician.uk/services/lighting-installation): Indoor, outdoor, security, and mood lighting

## Landlord Services

- [Landlord Services Overview](https://247electrician.uk/landlords): Complete electrical compliance services for property professionals with volume discounts
- [EICR Certificates for Landlords](https://247electrician.uk/landlords/eicr-certificates): Electrical safety reports, from £120 (standard) to £90 (contract rate)
- [Fire Alarm Testing](https://247electrician.uk/landlords/fire-alarm-testing): Annual servicing and Grade D1 installation for HMOs
- [Emergency Lighting Testing](https://247electrician.uk/landlords/emergency-lighting-testing): Monthly functional and annual duration testing
- [PAT Testing](https://247electrician.uk/landlords/pat-testing): Portable appliance testing from £2.50/item
- [Smoke & CO Detectors](https://247electrician.uk/landlords/smoke-co-detectors): Installation and compliance with 2022 regulations

- [Wolverhampton](https://247electrician.uk/areas/wolverhampton)
- [Birmingham](https://247electrician.uk/areas/birmingham)

- [West Bromwich](https://247electrician.uk/areas/west-bromwich)
- [Bilston](https://247electrician.uk/areas/bilston): Headquarters location
- [Cannock](https://247electrician.uk/areas/cannock)
- [Telford](https://247electrician.uk/areas/telford)
